question: Show marine biologists and zoologists with 5 years of experience.
sql_query1:
SELECT Marine_Biologists.name
FROM Marine_Biologists
WHERE Marine_Biologists.Experience = "5 years"
UNION
SELECT Zoologists.name
FROM Zoologists
WHERE Zoologists.Experience = "5 years"
sql_query2:
SELECT Marine_Biologists.name
FROM Marine_Biologists
UNION
SELECT Zoologists.name
FROM Zoologists
WHERE Zoologists.Experience = "5 years"
interpretation1: Show both marine biologists with 5 years of experience and zoologists with the same experience.
interpretation2: Show all marine biologists and also show zoologists with 5 years of experience.
